com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.network

Class NetworkMessageReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.AbstractMessageReceiver
      • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.network.AbstractNetworkMessageReceiver
        • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.messaging.network.NetworkMessageReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageReceiver, java.lang.Runnable

    public class NetworkMessageReceiver
extends AbstractNetworkMessageReceiver
implements IMessageReceiver
    Extends the super class expect the format of the byte array to be a serialization of the IApplicationDescriptor and IMessage objects. Works together with NetworkMessagSender.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Detail

      • getSourceAndMessage

        protected java.lang.Object[] getSourceAndMessage(java.io.InputStream input)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Read a byte array from the given stream and expect it to contain a compressed serialization of the IApplicationDescriptor and IMessage objects.
        Specified by:
        getSourceAndMessage in class AbstractNetworkMessageReceiver
        Parameters:
        input - stream to read the byte array. The byte array contains the information to recreate the two objects.
        Returns:
        array of length 2 with IApplicationDescriptor at 0 index and IMessage at index 1.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws DSMException
        Throws:
        DSMException
